name: Energy Search

effect.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

strengths: Can search for any basic Energy type
weaknesses: Takes a Trainer card slot for just Energy search
Could just run more Energy instead

competitiveHistory: Energy Search was a consistency card that helped find the right Energy type when needed. However, in most decks, running additional Energy was more efficient. It saw some play in multi-type decks that needed specific Energy types.

rulings.ruling: Energy Search can only find basic Energy cards, not Special Energy cards like Double Colorless Energy.
You must shuffle your deck after searching, even if you choose not to take an Energy.
